MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Keepers Lane, Knutsford Road, Hollins Lane and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:44am on 28th December 2020.
